languages.text: "Если вам угодно поразвлечься, подавить более маленькое и безопасное восстание — у меня в системе есть планетоид Райкади Филия. Там расположена тюрьма-колония, заключенные в которой устроили мятеж одновременно с еретиками на планете. Ситуация кругом глупая, мы могли бы разделаться с ними несколькими выстрелами с орбиты, но..." {n}Губернатор чуть поджимает губы.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если вам угодно поразвлечься, подавить более маленькое и безопасное восстание — у меня в системе есть планетоид Райкади Филия. Там расположена тюрьма-колония, заключенные в которой устроили мятеж одновременно с еретиками на планете. Ситуация кругом глупая, мы могли бы разделаться с ними несколькими выстрелами с орбиты, но..." {n}Губернатор чуть поджимает губы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to leisurely put down, there's a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a colony prison whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's a thoroughly ridiculous situation — it would only take us a couple of shots from orbit to take care of them — but..." {n}The governor purses his lips a little.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to leisurely put down, there's a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a colony prison whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's a thoroughly ridiculous situation — it would only take us a couple of shots from orbit to take care of them — but..." {n}The governor purses his lips a little.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to leisurely suppress, there's a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a colony prison whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to leisurely suppress, there's a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a colony prison whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

"If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr ein wenig Ablenkung sucht, einen kleineren, nicht ganz so gefährlichen Aufstand, den Ihr ganz entspannt niederschlagen könnt: Es gibt in meinem System einen Planetoiden namens Rykadi Philia. Dort befindet sich eine Gefängniskolonie, deren Insassen zur selben Zeit eine Rebellion angezettelt haben wie die Ketzer auf dem Planeten. Eine rundum hanebüchene Lage. Es hätten eigentlich nur ein paar Orbitalschüsse nötig sein sollen, um die Insassen zur Räson zu bringen, aber ..." {n}Der Gouverneur schürzt leicht die Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr ein wenig Ablenkung sucht, einen kleineren, nicht ganz so gefährlichen Aufstand, den Ihr ganz entspannt niederschlagen könnt: Es gibt in meinem System einen Planetoiden namens Rykadi Philia. Dort befindet sich eine Gefängniskolonie, deren Insassen zur selben Zeit eine Rebellion angezettelt haben wie die Ketzer auf dem Planeten. Eine rundum hanebüchene Lage. Es hätten eigentlich nur ein paar Orbitalschüsse nötig sein sollen, um die Insassen zur Räson zu bringen, aber ..." {n}Der Gouverneur schürzt leicht die Lippen.{/n}

languages.text: « Si vous cherchez une distraction, une révolte plus limitée et moins dangereuse à réprimer tranquillement, mon système abrite un planétoïde baptisé Rykadi Philia. On y trouve une colonie pénitentiaire dont les condamnés se sont révoltés en même temps que les hérétiques de la planète. C'est une situation tout à fait grotesque, il nous aurait suffi de quelques tirs orbitaux pour les anéantir, mais... » {n}Le gouverneur pince légèrement les lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si vous cherchez une distraction, une révolte plus limitée et moins dangereuse à réprimer tranquillement, mon système abrite un planétoïde baptisé Rykadi Philia. On y trouve une colonie pénitentiaire dont les condamnés se sont révoltés en même temps que les hérétiques de la planète. C'est une situation tout à fait grotesque, il nous aurait suffi de quelques tirs orbitaux pour les anéantir, mais... » {n}Le gouverneur pince légèrement les lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: “如果您想消遣一下，悠闲地镇压一下规模更小、力量更弱的叛乱，您可以去这个星系里那颗名叫莱卡德菲利亚星的小行星。那上面的殖民是一座监狱，当地的囚犯与小莱卡德的叛军一起造反……这真是个荒唐的巧合。我们本来只要来上两轮轨道炮击就能解决他们，不过……”{n}总督微微撇了撇嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果您想消遣一下，悠闲地镇压一下规模更小、力量更弱的叛乱，您可以去这个星系里那颗名叫莱卡德菲利亚星的小行星。那上面有座殖民地监狱，当地的囚犯与小莱卡德的叛军一起造反……这真是个荒唐的巧合。我们本来只要来上两轮轨道炮击就能解决他们，不过……”{n}总督微微撇了撇嘴。{/n}

languages.text: 「気晴らしに、規模が小さく危険度の低い反乱でも鎮圧したいというなら、我が星系にライカディ・フィリアという小惑星がある。そこにはコロニー刑務所があって、囚人達はこの惑星の異端者達と同時に反乱を起こした。何もかも馬鹿馬鹿しい事態だ…軌道上に2、3発撃ち込めば片付くはずだったのだが…」{n}総督は、わずかに唇を噛む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「気晴らしに、規模が小さく危険度の低い反乱でも鎮圧したいというなら、我が星系にライカディ・フィリアという小惑星がある。そこにはコロニー刑務所があって、囚人達はこの惑星の異端者達と同時に反乱を起こした。何もかも馬鹿馬鹿しい事態だ…軌道上に2、3発撃ち込めば片付くはずだったのだが…」{n}総督は、わずかに唇を噛む。{/n}

languages.text: «Si busca una distracción, hay un levantamiento más pequeño y que puede reprimir cuando le interese. Está en un planetoide de mi sistema llamado Rykadi Philia. Alberga una colonia prisión cuyos reclusos se rebelaron al mismo tiempo que los herejes del planeta. Es una situación absurda en todos los sentidos, solo deberíamos haber necesitado un par de disparos orbitales para acabar con ellos, pero...». {n}El gobernador frunce ligeramente los labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si busca una distracción, hay un levantamiento más pequeño y fácil de reprimir. Está en un planetoide de mi sistema llamado Rykadi Philia. Alberga una colonia prisión cuyos reclusos se rebelaron al mismo tiempo que los herejes del planeta. Es una situación absurda en todos los sentidos, solo deberíamos haber necesitado un par de disparos orbitales para acabar con ellos, pero...». {n}El gobernador frunce ligeramente los labios.{/n}

languages.text: "Biraz kafa dağıtmak için rahatça bastırabileceğiniz daha ufak çaplı ve güvenli bir isyan isterseniz sistemimde Rykadi Philia adında bir cüce gezegen var. Oradaki hapishane kolonisindeki mahkûmlar, bu gezegendeki kâfirlerle aynı anda isyan çıkardı. Her açıdan abes bir durum. İcaplarına bakmamız sadece birkaç yörünge atışına bakardı da..." {n}Vali, hafifçe dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you'd like a distraction, a smaller and safer uprising to suppress at your leisure, there is a planetoid in my system called Rykadi Philia. It hosts a prison colony whose inmates rebelled at the same time as the heretics on the planet. It's an all-round preposterous situation — it should have only taken us a couple of orbital shots to take care of them, but..." {n}The governor slightly purses his lips.{/n}
